scripts.start: npm run server-build && npx cross-env ENV=production MAX_WORKERS=7 node server/dist/index.uws.js
scripts.start:pm2: npm run server-build && npx cross-env ENV=production MAX_WORKERS=7 CLUSTER_INSTANCES=1 npm run pm2-puppeteer-ssr:uws
scripts.dev: cross-env ENV=development BUILD_TOOL=webpack npm run start-dev
scripts.dev:fastify: cross-env ENV=development BUILD_TOOL=webpack npm run start-dev:fastify
scripts.dev:uws: cross-env ENV=development BUILD_TOOL=webpack npm run start-dev:uws
scripts.build:esm: cross-env ESM=true npx webpack --mode=production && npx tsc
scripts.preview: cross-env MODE=development ENV=production BUILD_TOOL=webpack npm run start-preview
scripts.preview:fastify: cross-env MODE=development ENV=production BUILD_TOOL=webpack npm run start-preview:fastify
scripts.preview:uws: cross-env MODE=development ENV=production BUILD_TOOL=webpack npm run start-preview:uws
scripts.start-preview: cross-env RESET_RESOURCE=true MAX_WORKERS=7 node -r sucrase/register server/src/index.ts
scripts.start-preview:fastify: cross-env RESET_RESOURCE=true MAX_WORKERS=7 node -r sucrase/register server/src/index.fastify.ts
scripts.start-preview:uws: cross-env RESET_RESOURCE=true MAX_WORKERS=7 node -r sucrase/register server/src/index.uws.ts
scripts.start-puppeteer-ssr: cross-env PUPPETEER_SSR_PORT=8080 npx pm2 -i 1 --silent start npm --name "start-puppeteer-ssr" -- run pm2-puppeteer-ssr
scripts.format: npm run prettier:fix && npm run lint:fix
scripts.pre-commit: npm run server-build && git add ./server/dist & npx tsc && lint-staged
scripts.prepare: git config core.autocrlf false && npx husky install

lint-staged.*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}: npm run prettier:fix && npm run lint
